title: Perform Crane to Vessel Lashing Check
description: Before a crane operator begins lifting containers, a checker on the vessel must confirm the container's twistlocks are unlocked.

tasks.description: The crane operator lowers the spreader onto the first container to be discharged.
tasks.expected_outcome: The crane's spreader is positioned over the target container.

tasks.description: The lashing gang on the ship confirms that all four corner twistlocks are unlocked and gives a 'clear to lift' signal.
tasks.expected_outcome: The checker gives a thumbs-up signal or confirms via radio.

tasks.description: The crane operator receives the signal and proceeds to lock the spreader and lift the container.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator safely lifts the container from the vessel.
